Articles.Content:
CalCraft Industries releases its first spaceplane!

The X-1 "Sweptstar" is a small plane with swept wing that can take off at low throttle, and is somewhat over-sensitive. It has a high vertical climb altitude and lands extremely softly. (Images are in attachments since I do not know how to post w/o a link.) Download included!

All rating are based on 10 being the best, 1 means that it is too bad/slow at the action, 19 mean too good for safe flying.

X-1 Ratings:

Maneuverability: 14/10 (oversensitive on roll)

Speed: 9/10 (Can reach 500m/s not dependent on attitude)

Landing: 10/10 (may glitch with hills upon landing)

Takeoff: 9/10 (Low speed take off, yaws slightly to sides on ground)

Edited August 25, 2012 by Hammaneggs

CalCraft has released a new plane designed to scare the engineers and and launch staff into staying inside. It is called the X-2 *yet to be named*.

Ratings:

Maneuverability: 9/10 (sluggish pitch)

Speed: 6/10 (extremely slow acceleration)

Landing: 10/10 (Great landings)

Takeoff: 10/10 (Slight yaw)

I have finally re-opened CalCraft industries with the new X-3! It can go pretty fast and is very maneuverable!

<High speed and altitude

Warning: Bad maneuvering at high altitudes.

Ratings:

Maneuverability: 10/10 (easy to fly)

Speed: 8.5/10 (fast acceleration)

Landing: 13/10 (doesn't want to come down)

Takeoff: 10/10 (almost instantly)

Edited September 15, 2012 by Hammaneggs
Working on a series of planes with the Sunbeam laser mod, get ready for some interesting craft!
Nice aircraft, though it might need a tailfin.

Nice aircraft, though it might need a tailfin.

The rudder is on the rectangular part of the wing, I forgot to get a good view. Rudder=straight takeoff.
Good to see you back in business.
Thanks, I though you would be mad with my leaving Voyager.
